summary: A man plans a hold-up with a group of trusted fellows, he gets his hands on the money, and the girl - what could go wrong? Almost everything.
cast: Robert Hossein|Jean Sorel|Catherine Rouvel|Georges Wilson|Lucien Raimbourg|Nicole Berger|Jacques Bertrand|Jean-Jacques Delbo|Sophie Grimaldi|Jean Lefebvre|Maurice Nasil|Armand Mestral|Serge Bento|Maurice Bénard|Lucien Callamand|Robert Dalban
keywords: neo noir|foreign language adaptation|based on novel
title: Carne de perdición
